This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0618 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
LI ListedListed
UL Unlisted (Should not appear in directories)Unlisted (Should not appear in directories)
UP UnpublishedUnpublished

name: Protection
title: protection
description: Code system of concepts specifying that an address needs to be treated with special care or sensitivity. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the XAD and XTN segments.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0618 (Protection Code)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
